question: The right to constitutional remedies in India is available to __?
option2: All persons incase of infringement of any fundamental righ
option3: any person for enforcing any of the fundamental rights conferred on all persons
answer: any person for enforcing any of the fundamental rights conferred on all persons
explanation: Article 32 of the Indian Constitution describes the provisions whereby individuals may seek redressal for the violation of their fundamental rights. It is available to any person for enforcing any of the fundamental rights conferred on all persons.
